product_name: Green Guru Flash Stem Handlebar Bag
long_description: Made from upcycled materials and built with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Flash Stem Handlebar Bag uses a transparent pocket to keep your phone, GPS or map within easy view while you ride. The Green Guru Flash Stem Handlebar Bag is constructed out of reused bicycle inner tubes, plastic bottles and banners for water-resistant performance. Inside you can stash your lunch, shades, sunscreen or a couple canned beverages, and side elastic mesh pocket stores small items. Rip-and-stick straps easily mount to your handlebars. Please note that because this item is made of upcycled materials, each one is unique and specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: Made from upcycled materials and built with high-quality worksmanship, the Green Guru Flash Stem Handlebar Bag uses a transparent pocket to keep your phone, GPS or map within easy view while you ride.
